name: Facebook Minimalistic Login (Prince Tribute)
description: Based on kilroy's original style. Background is changed to purple and rain background is added.
additional_info:
Now, I may have been born long before Prince's heyday, but I still know he was quite a musical prodigy (unlike Justin Bieber). So I decided to do something to honour the musician by.

This is based on user 43074's style 43192 userstyle, and is inspired by the doodle Google set up to remember the musician. Compared to the original style, the background was changed to purple and a rain background was added (which is referencing Prince's signature song "Purple Rain").

This is a rather simple style, but I believe that it should be shared. Good night, sweet Prince.
